title: DevOps Fundamentals
description: Understand CI/CD, containers, and cloud tools.
longDescription: Learn the basics of DevOps, including continuous integration/deployment, containerization with Docker, and tools like Jenkins, Git, and Kubernetes.

title: Cybersecurity Basics
description: Learn how to protect systems and networks.
longDescription: This course covers the fundamentals of cybersecurity, including network security, ethical hacking, firewalls, and securing web applications.

title: MS Office Complete Course
description: Master Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook.
longDescription: Get hands-on training in MS Office tools including document formatting, spreadsheets, presentations, and email communication.

title: English Speaking Course
description: Improve your spoken English and communication skills.
longDescription: Focuses on pronunciation, grammar, vocabulary building, and fluency. Practical exercises and real-life conversations included.

title: C/C++ Programming
description: Learn core programming with C and C++.
longDescription: Covers syntax, control structures, pointers, memory management, OOP in C++, and common algorithms for problem-solving.

title: Basic of Computer
description: Learn fundamental computer concepts.
longDescription: Ideal for beginners: covers operating systems, hardware, software, file handling, and basic troubleshooting.

title: Flutter Development
description: Build cross-platform apps using Flutter.
longDescription: Learn Dart programming and use Flutter to create modern, responsive mobile apps for Android and iOS.

title: Kotlin Programming
description: Android development with Kotlin.
longDescription: Covers Kotlin syntax, Android Studio integration, and best practices for modern Android app development.

title: Ruby Programming
description: Begin with Ruby and web development basics.
longDescription: Learn Ruby syntax, control structures, and OOP. A good start to explore Ruby on Rails later.

title: React JS Web Development
description: Create dynamic web apps with React JS.
longDescription: Learn about React components, hooks, state management, and deploying web applications.

title: Angular Development
description: Develop scalable web apps with Angular.
longDescription: Master components, services, routing, and RxJS in Angular framework.

title: Data Science Foundations
description: Learn data handling, analysis, and visualization.
longDescription: Covers Python for data science, NumPy, Pandas, data cleaning, visualization, and basic machine learning.

title: AI & Machine Learning
description: Dive into ML algorithms and AI systems.
longDescription: Understand supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and model evaluation with real-world datasets.

title: Prompt Engineering for AI
description: Learn to write effective prompts for AI tools.
longDescription: Master prompt strategies for ChatGPT, image generators, and other AI platforms to enhance productivity.

title: How to Use AI Tools
description: Get hands-on with popular AI tools.
longDescription: Covers how to use AI for writing, coding, image generation, and business automation using tools like ChatGPT, Copilot, Midjourney, etc.

title: Core Java Programming
description: Learn Java from scratch including OOP concepts.
longDescription: This course covers fundamental Java programming concepts, including variables, data types, loops, functions, and object-oriented principles. Ideal for anyone looking to build strong programming foundations.

title: Python Programming Essentials
description: Start coding with Python and explore real-world examples.
longDescription: This beginner-friendly course teaches Python basics, including variables, control flow, functions, and data structures. Hands-on examples will guide you through problem-solving techniques.

title: Full Stack Web Development
description: Learn to build websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and backend tech.
longDescription: From designing responsive layouts with HTML/CSS to writing interactive scripts in JavaScript and building server-side applications with Node.js, this course prepares you to become a full stack developer.

title: Diploma in Computer Applications (DCA)
description: Basic diploma course in computer applications.
longDescription: DCA is designed for beginners and covers basic computer concepts, MS Office, internet applications, and an introduction to programming. Suitable for students and working professionals.

title: Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Applications (PGDCA)
description: Advanced diploma course for postgraduates in computer applications.
longDescription: PGDCA offers in-depth knowledge of programming languages, database management, networking, and software development, preparing students for careers in IT and software industries.
